titleStmt.title: Sir Hudibras to the Vintners: a satyr on their adulterated dear wines.
titleStmt.author: Sacheverell, George.

notesStmt.note: At foot of caption title: two line verse in Latin, by "Martial".
Text verse starts: For sharpest vinegar and bitterest gall, the abused and incensed muses call; ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
